## [TableColumn](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/table-column)

### Methods

|                                                     Method                                                     |                                    Return type                                     |                Brief description                 |
|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| [getCell(cellIndex)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/table-column#getCell(Integer)) | [TableCell](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/table-cell) | Returns the cell at the specified index.         |
| [getIndex()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/table-column#getIndex())               | `Integer`                                                                          | Returns the 0-based index of the column.         |
| [getNumCells()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/table-column#getNumCells())         | `Integer`                                                                          | Returns the number of cells in this column.      |
| [getParentTable()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/table-column#getParentTable())   | [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/table)          | Returns the table containing the current column. |
| [getWidth()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/table-column#getWidth())               | `Number`                                                                           | Returns the width of the column in points.       |
| [remove()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/table-column#remove())                   | `void`                                                                             | Removes the table column.                        |
